title: Unable to connect to the login queue? Is this happening to anybody else?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: i tried to login today and got this error i also tried to login to the league of legends website and got another error saying login queues are down. Is anyone else getting this problem and anybody know when it will be fixed?

replies.body: Yeah, we are undergoing maintenance but it's resulted in login issues for players on NA.  We'll be posting updates on both the [maintenance thread ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/PTQej3Tj-june-7th-na-ranked-disabled-for-live-maintenance?comment=001a)as well as the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hang tight!
